projects.title: 7 Hills Ceilidh Band Website
projects.description: Built a website for a Ceilidh Band which uses a Wordpress theme with a child theme for customizations. The website has a booking form and all the information for client. It is also integrated with Google Analytics and Google Search Console.
deliverables: Optimized site to rank well on Google for the term 'ceilidh band edinburgh' using a combination of technical SEO and link building
Maintain hosting and any issues which may arise from site
Integrated reviews api to pull from Facebook and Mailgun to ensure emails arrived in the inbox

projects.title: Earthquake Tracker App
projects.description: Built a web app using VueJs which tracks earthquakes around the world. The app uses the USGS API to pull in data and display it on a map. The app also has a feature to filter the data by magnitude and date.
deliverables: Completed the MVP as specified in the task brief in 4 days despite having limited VueJs experience
Used VueX to manage state and Cypress for end to end testing
Created utils file with helper functions to keep code DRY

projects.title: Liz Mackie Pilates
projects.description: Communicated with client to establish needs, kept stream of communication open throughout the process to ensure that she was satisfied with the website.
deliverables: Ensured all the logos she provided were used in the website
Kept website simple so that is was easy for my client to maintain / update
Ensured that the website was mobile responsive

projects.title: Crown Clothing Learning Project
projects.description: This project was made in order to upskill in the aforementioned technologies, part of the Zero to Mastery Web Dev Course on Udemy.
deliverables: Followed tutorials in order to build the app and to ensure understanding of every line of code
Integrated Firebase for user authentication and database storage
